plain:
Based on the user's favourite movies, it can be inferred that the user enjoys:
- Epic space fantasy (Star Wars Episode IV: A New Hope, Star Wars Episode V: The Empire Strikes Back)
- Historical dramas (Legends of the Fall, Dances with Wolves, Gone with the Wind, The African Queen, Doctor Zhivago, Shakespeare in Love, The Patriot, Shane)
- Romantic comedies (My Fair Lady, Tom Jones, Barefoot in the Park, Moonstruck)
- Coming-of-age stories (Forrest Gump, Stand by Me, American Graffiti)
- Adventure films (Maverick, Raiders of the Lost Ark, Jeremiah Johnson, The Horse Whisperer)
- War dramas (Saving Private Ryan, Witness)
- Titanic-themed movies (Titanic)
- Westerns (Field of Dreams, The Patriot, Shane)
- Movies with a strong sense of place (Legends of the Fall, Forrest Gump, Dances with Wolves, Gone with the Wind, The African Queen, The Patriot, Shane)
- Movies with a focus on character development (Forrest Gump, Maverick, Dances with Wolves, Gone with the Wind, The African Queen, Doctor Zhivago, Shakespeare in Love, Barefoot in the Park, Moonstruck, American Graffiti)
- Movies with a mix of humour and heart (My Fair Lady, Tom Jones, Barefoot in the Park, Moonstruck, American Graffiti)
- Movies with a strong emotional core (Forrest Gump, Maverick, Dances with Wolves, Gone with the Wind, The African Queen, Doctor Zhivago, Shakespeare in Love, Barefoot in the Park, Moonstruck, American Graffiti)
- Movies with a focus on relationships (My Fair Lady, Tom Jones, Barefoot in the Park, Moonstruck, American Graffiti)
- Movies with a mix of drama and romance (My Fair Lady, Tom Jones, Barefoot in the Park, Moonstruck, American Graffiti)
- Movies with a strong sense of morality (Forrest Gump, Maverick, Dances with Wolves, Gone with the Wind, The African Queen, Doctor Zhivago, Shakespeare in Love, Barefoot in the Park, Moonstruck, American Graffiti)
- Movies with a focus on social commentary (Forrest Gump, Maverick, Dances with Wolves, Gone with the Wind, The African Queen, Doctor Zhivago, Shakespeare in Love, Barefoot in the Park, Moonstruck
